title: View the CloudSlang code
content:
View the CloudSlang code about the inputs, outputs, and results of the step.

You can see information about the step's inputs, outputs, and navigation steps in the CloudSlang code for the flow.

To view the code, click the Show as Text button in the Authoring pane toolbar.. A text box appears, displaying the code. The details of the steps are displayed in the "workflow:" section.

Related topics
